title: Furnished Room For Rent In Braintree- Flexible Term-Utilities Included
posting_body: One fully FURNISHED queen size bedroom for rent.
Safe and quiet neighborhood.
No pets or NO smoking, please.
No Overnight guests or visitors.
Single Occupancy Only.
Shared kitchen and bathroom.
For quick consideration, please send a message with a brief introduction.
Public Transport
5 min walking distance to Weymouth commuter rail station
Local bus stop outside the house take you to Quincy Center T Redline
Easy access to express highway, Rt 53, 93, 128, 95, 3
Perfect for commuting to Downtown Boston, Finance District, Cambridge, UMass, NEU, Harvard, MIT, etc.
Utilities Included
• Utilities included Heating, Electricity, WIFI and hot water
• Off Street Parking
• No charged On Site Laundry washer/dryer
Rental application, credit check, background screening, and proof of employment required.
Move In Cost: First and last required.
Monthly Rental $1100.00
If interested, please call me at 617 669 8719 for private tour or more information.
